entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
